titles:
Pi hook: auto-title sessions from commit messages

- Hook detects git commit commands via tool_result event
- Extracts commit message from -m flag
- Saves as session title to .resume-sessions/sessions.json
- Updates terminal tab title via ANSI escape

Simplified from earlier prompting approach which had timing issues.

Add resume command to display Pi sessions with titles

- find_pi_sessions() discovers sessions in ~/.pi/agent/sessions/
- project_name_to_path() converts encoded dir names back to paths
- resume command shows sessions with dates, projects, and titles
- Smart path resolution handles hyphens in directory names
